channel.title: How do i raise tha max levels to 135?
channel.description: how do i raise the max levels to 135? i am using deltas source

item.title: How do i raise tha max levels to 135?
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

[quote=“Cloud7Strife, post:9, topic:235708”][code]Uhh im not sure if this would work with delta but it’s worth a try

[code(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“master”) && playerRights >= 3)
{
addSkillXP(14000000, 0);
addSkillXP(14000000, 1);
addSkillXP(14000000, 2);
addSkillXP(14000000, 3);
addSkillXP(14000000, 4);
addSkillXP(14000000, 5);
addSkillXP(14000000, 6);
addSkillXP(14000000, 7);
addSkillXP(14000000, 8);
addSkillXP(14000000, 9);
addSkillXP(14000000, 10);
addSkillXP(14000000, 11);
addSkillXP(14000000, 12);
addSkillXP(14000000, 13);
addSkillXP(14000000, 14);
addSkillXP(14000000, 15);
addSkillXP(14000000, 16);
addSkillXP(14000000, 17);
addSkillXP(14000000, 18);
addSkillXP(14000000, 19);
addSkillXP(14000000, 20);
addSkillXP(14000000, 21);
addSkillXP(14000000, 22);
addSkillXP(14000000, 23);
addSkillXP(14000000, 24);
sendMessage(“NERD!!!”);
}[/code]

If this doesnt work and the other one doesnt work Im not really sure what will… =/
sorry for the stuff being out of place the stuff is screwing up and yeah…[/quote]
No.
Here;

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 3) { addSkillXP(14000000, 0); addSkillXP(14000000, 1); addSkillXP(14000000, 2); addSkillXP(14000000, 3); addSkillXP(14000000, 4); addSkillXP(14000000, 5); addSkillXP(14000000, 6); addSkillXP(14000000, 7); addSkillXP(14000000, 8); addSkillXP(14000000, 9); addSkillXP(14000000, 10); addSkillXP(14000000, 11); addSkillXP(14000000, 12); addSkillXP(14000000, 13); addSkillXP(14000000, 14); addSkillXP(14000000, 15); addSkillXP(14000000, 16); addSkillXP(14000000, 17); addSkillXP(14000000, 18); addSkillXP(14000000, 19); addSkillXP(14000000, 20); addSkillXP(14000000, 21); addSkillXP(14000000, 22); addSkillXP(14000000, 23); addSkillXP(14000000, 24); sM("You raise your levels."); }

item.title: How do i raise tha max levels to 135?
item.dc:creator: @Kindler Kindler
item.description:
@Kindler wrote:

go to client.java and search for Return 99
then you will see this

[code] public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

    for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
        points += Math.floor(
                (double) lvl + 150.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
        output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
        if (output >= exp) {
            return lvl;
        }
    }
    return 99;[/code]

Simply change for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) { and return 99;[/ to the desired max lvl eg this is what it will look like if you want 135

[code] }

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
    int points = 0;
    int output = 0;

    for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= [b]135[/b]; lvl++) {
        points += Math.floor(
                (double) lvl + 150.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
        output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
        if (output >= exp) {
            return lvl;
        }
    }
    return [b]135[/b];[/code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 08, 2008, 03:33:47 pm[/size][hr]u beat me to it lol

Read full topic

item.title: How do i raise tha max levels to 135?
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Search;

return 99;

99 Is your max level.
Then change the underlined numbers to your new max level.

if (exp > 13034430) return [u][b]99[/b][/u]; for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= [u][b]99[/b][/u]; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0)); output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return 0; }
